document.title: Hot Topic: The 2002/2003 MTAS Salary and Fringe Benefit Survey
document.abstract: The MTAS annual salary and fringe benefit survey for 2002/2003 shows salary increases for city employees rose significantly over 2001/2002 data. This report contains a summary of the findings as well as a means to request specific information.
